results.deck: Sting Entertainment is a Japanese video game development studio known for their JRPGs.
results.description:
Sting Entertainment is a Japanese studio known mainly for their Dept. Heaven franchise.
 

Console Games:

 

Sharp X68000:

  • Last Battallion
 

PC-Engine:

  • OverRide
 

SNES:

  • Treasure Hunter G - Publisher: Square - 1996
  • Solid Runner - Publisher: ASCII - 1997
 

Sega Saturn:

  • Baroque - Publisher: Sting Entertainment - 1998
 

PlayStation:

  • Baroque - Publisher: Sting Entertainment - 1999
  • Baroque Syndrome - Publisher: Sting Entertainment - 2000

Dreamcast:

  • Evolution: The World of Sacred Device - Publishers: ESP Software (JP) / Ubisoft (US & EU) - 1999
  • Evolution 2: Far Off Promise - Publishers: ESP Software (JP) / Ubisoft (US & EU) - 1999 (JP) / 2000 (US) / 2002 (EU)
 

PlayStation 2:

  • Baroque - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) / Rising Star Games (EU) - 2007 (JP) / 2008 (US & EU)
  • Dokapon Kingdom - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) - 2007 (JP) / 2008 (US)

GameCube:

  • Evolution Worlds - Publishers: ESP Software (JP) / Ubisoft (US & EU) - 2002 (JP & US) / 2003 (EU)
 

Wii:

  • Baroque - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) / Rising Star Games (EU) - 2008
  • Dokapon Kingdom - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) - 2007 (JP) / 2008 (US)
 

Handheld Games:

 

Game Boy Colour:

  • Koguru Guruguru: Guruguru to Nakayoshi - Publisher: ??? - 2001

WonderSwan Color:

  • Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord - Publisher: ??? - 2001
  • Riviera: The Promised Land - Publisher: Bandai - 2002
 

Game Boy Advance: 

  • Riviera: The Promised Land - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) - 2004 (JP) / 2005 (US)
  • Yggdra Union: We'll Never Fight Alone - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) / 505 Games (EU) - 2006 (JP & US) / 2008 (EU)
 

Nintendo DS:

  • Dokapon Journey - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) - 2008 (JP) / 2009 (US)
  • Knights in the Nightmare - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) - 2008 (JP) / 2009 (US)
  • Yggdra Unison: Seiken Buyuuden  - Publisher: Sting Entertainment - 2009
 

PlayStation Portable: 

  • Riviera: The Promised Land - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) / 505 Games (EU) - 2006 (JP) / 2007 (US) / 2008 (EU)
  • Yggdra Union: We'll Never Fight Alone - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) - 2008 (JP & US)
  • Hexyz Force - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) - 2009 (JP) / 2010 (US)
  • Knights in the Nightmare - Publishers: Sting Entertainment (JP) / Atlus (US) - 2010
  • Blaze Union: Story to Reach the Future - Publisher: Atlus - 2010
  • Gungnir: Masou no Gunjin to Eiyuu Sensou  - Publisher: Atlus - 2011

PC Games:

  • Baroque Shooting - Publisher: ??? - 2000
  • Haruka Typing - Publisher: ??? - 2001
  • Baroque Typing - Publisher: ??? - 2002
  • Dept. Heaven Episode III (title currently unknown) - Publisher: TBA - TBA
